channel.title: The blue screen of death
channel.description:
Well. I am having some bad luck today. First off i get woke up early and then i came down stairs to be halted in my tracks. It was the blue screen of death. ON FUCKING 2 OF MY COMPUTERS! I tried reinstalling xp and i even tried my worst enemy vista. But the blue screen of death would pop back up and laugh at me. So all i can say is FUCK!
pissed off hardcore :mad:

item.title: The blue screen of death
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“boomer216, post:6, topic:226965”][quote author=io9 link=topic=298272.msg2396154#msg2396154 date=1219170520]
It’s because of your client.java. Java gurus have done research and have surprisingly found that people with a client.java of over 9000 lines have multiplied their chances of receiving a BSoD by more than tenfold!
[/quote]

I thought it was 10k lines… but nonetheless I heard that the use of handlers decreases the risk of Blue Screen o’ Death.[/quote]
errm, no, over 9000 (google it)

Read full topic

item.title: The blue screen of death
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:8, topic:226965"][quote author=boomer216 link=topic=298272.msg2396195#msg2396195 date=1219171576]

It’s because of your client.java. Java gurus have done research and have surprisingly found that people with a client.java of over 9000 lines have multiplied their chances of receiving a BSoD by more than tenfold!

I thought it was 10k lines… but nonetheless I heard that the use of handlers decreases the risk of Blue Screen o’ Death.
[/quote]
Let’s just say big[/quote]
Both of you are retarded.

Read full topic
